title: Their Everything (Chosen #3C)
description:
PART 3: BBW Shifter/Vampire Serial MFM Who will win the battle to claim Becky? Especially since the victor may not even be able to convince her that forever is possible. The little human has some tough decisions to make. All three of them do. Their choices will not only affect their own futures but those of all the non-humans. ‘Their Everything’ is the last part of this serial and will be a minimum of 36,000 words/144 pages Be warned, the story contains strong sexual themes/language and is not intended for readers under the age of 18. (Ménage) 
Reading order - 1. Chosen by the Vampire Kings 2. Stolen by the Alpha Wolf 3. Unlikely Mates
author: Charlene Hartnady
